PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-07262022-06-23,  ,  ,  ,  ISED
ActCanadian Tourism Commission Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Tourism of BENJAMIN RYAN of Whitehorse, Yukon, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Tourism Commission, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Patricia (Patti) Balsillie, whose term has expired.
AttachmentsAttachment
